text: Barricade is a 1939 American adventure movie. It was directed by Gregory Ratoff. The movie stars Alice Faye, Warner Baxter, Charles Winninger, Arthur Treacher, Keye Luke, Doris Lloyd. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 adventure movies Category:1930s American adventure movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Gregory Ratoff Category:Movies set in China Category:Movies set in Mongolia Category:Movies set on trains
title: Barricade (1939 movie)
